predicate.note: Frames file for 'insult' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

roleset.name: call names

example.name: your mother wears army boots
example.text: Mr. Stanley is on trial over charges that he violated a proclamation, issued by the South African administrator general earlier this year, which made it a crime punishable by two years in prison for any person to ``insult, disparate or belittle'' the election commission.

roleset.note: 'disparate' above is certainly a typo for 'disparage.'
